channel.title: RuneMart PvP ~ Instant PK, Restricted Spawn/Eco, Bossing, PK Titles, Unique
channel.description:
[CENTER][LEFT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B6E5tWd.png[/img]
Server is:[B] Online![/B]
[U][B][IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/keh1380118445q.png[/img][/B][/U] [IMG]http://i948.photobucket.com/albums/ad328/Miasmic_Ltd/f23ggo.png[/img] [URL=http://rmrsps.uphero.com/][U]Webclient[/U][/URL] - [IMG]http://cdn2.iconfinder.com/data/icons/splashyIcons/download.png[/img] [URL=http://rmrsps.uphero.com/client.jar][U]Download Client[/U][/URL] - [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://www.runemart.com/][U]Forums[/U][/URL] - [IMG]http://www.tradearcadepro.com/images/CheckIconSmall.png[/img][URL=http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/vote-35521.html][U]Vote[/U][/URL]
[LEFT][U]Note:[/U] For now we are using the free host because the forums host is temporarily down. We will move our webclient to our paid host whenever it's back up again. We will also be setting up a voting system by then. Please be patient while we sort things out.[/LEFT]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/xnk1380118610e.png[/img]
RM PvP is a restricted spawning server with a stable economy which runs on a universal point system. This means that you can get points no matter if you are PKing, slaying bosses or even skilling - that's right, even though we are a PvP server we have all working skills that influence the economy seeing how skilling also gives you points. We offer you stable and unique gameplay and with that said, ladies and gentlemen, I give you RuneMart PvP. Welcome.
[U]Note:[/U] We are currently in BETA stage, which means that you may encounter some bugs. If you happen to do so, please report them directly to me and I will fix them ASAP. Thanks for understanding.
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/qik1380119040a.png[/img]
- 602 NPC's - 602 Character Models - 634 Items - 602 Animations/Graphics (Perfected) - 525 Gameframe - 100% Prayer & HP orbs with proper draining - Fully working XP Counter - Fullscreen Mode - Updated interfaces - Decent cache size - Smooth and fast loading - Flawless switches - New FKeys - Perfect barrage orbs - Restricted Spawning - Custom PKing title system - Advanced PKing system with killstreaks and rewards - Well-thought out economy - Very stable - All working special attacks for existing items - Various Bosses for economy based drops - Full Duel Arena - Custom Barrows minigame w/ reward chest - Amazing combat system - 90% working ancient curses (no saps) - Universal point system with rewards
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/yke1380118426t.png[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/wjo1380112769.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/keh1380112854p.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/qik1379942564w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/wjo1380119337k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/qik1380119349s.png[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/epl1379942115n.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/jef1380035210u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TfC3zCr.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ayZSzUC.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/qik1379947943q.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/jef1379942144e.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://turboimg.com/p/yke1380033942x.png[/img]
[B][U]Credits[/U][/B]
Orel for the Source Twisty for the Client Banks for the banner Project Pk for Spawn Tab base[/CENTER][/LEFT]

item.title: RuneMart PvP ~ Instant PK, Restricted Spawn/Eco, Bossing, PK Titles, Unique
item.dc:creator: @k3wl_0wnz_y0 k3wl 0wnz y0
item.description:
@k3wl_0wnz_y0 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:531441”]Initial thoughts is that I see that skillers have some decent skills to train so good job on that.

Other thoughts though is that the name really makes it sound more…well…yeah you know what I mean lol[/quote]I know. Seeing how it has been a RuneScape community/blackmarket for 6 years, it has a name that does not really suit your typical RSPS but it does not make it worse of a RSPS. You’ll see if you try it out. We will be doing some serious advertisments and be gaining a lot of traffic in the next few days, for now the forums are down for maintenance but will be up in 1-2 days and by then we will start reaking in quite a few players.

Read full topic

item.description:
@k3wl_0wnz_y0 wrote:

[CENTER][LEFT]

Server is: Online!


Webclient - Download Client - Forums - Vote

[LEFT]Note: For now we are using the free host because the forums host is temporarily down.
We will move our webclient to our paid host whenever it’s back up again.
We will also be setting up a voting system by then.
Please be patient while we sort things out.[/LEFT]

RM PvP is a restricted spawning server with a stable economy which runs on a universal point system.
This means that you can get points no matter if you are PKing, slaying bosses or even skilling -
that’s right, even though we are a PvP server we have all working skills that influence the economy seeing how skilling also gives you points.
We offer you stable and unique gameplay and with that said, ladies and gentlemen, I give you RuneMart PvP. Welcome.

Note: We are currently in BETA stage, which means that you may encounter some bugs.
If you happen to do so, please report them directly to me and I will fix them ASAP. Thanks for understanding.

  • 602 NPC’s
  • 602 Character Models
  • 634 Items
  • 602 Animations/Graphics (Perfected)
  • 525 Gameframe
  • 100% Prayer & HP orbs with proper draining
  • Fully working XP Counter
  • Fullscreen Mode
  • Updated interfaces
  • Decent cache size
  • Smooth and fast loading
  • Flawless switches
  • New FKeys
  • Perfect barrage orbs
  • Restricted Spawning
  • Custom PKing title system
  • Advanced PKing system with killstreaks and rewards
  • Well-thought out economy
  • Very stable
  • All working special attacks for existing items
  • Various Bosses for economy based drops
  • Full Duel Arena
  • Custom Barrows minigame w/ reward chest
  • Amazing combat system
  • 90% working ancient curses (no saps)
  • Universal point system with rewards

Twisty for the Client

Project Pk for Spawn Tab base[/CENTER][/LEFT]
